participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Alex enjoys meeting new people and engaging in lively conversations.
participant_1.background: Alex grew up in a small town and moved to the city for college, where he developed a passion for technology and social interactions.

participant_2.name: Maria Gonzalez
participant_2.personality: Warm and approachable, Maria loves to support others and has a knack for making people feel at ease.
participant_2.background: Maria comes from a multicultural family and has lived in various countries, which has enriched her perspective on life.
